          <title>
            <string language="en">Levels of sound in decibels</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stufen des Tones in den Dezibel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Niveaux de bruit en décibels</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Níveis do som nos decibels</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Livelli del suono nei decibel</string>

          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the loudness levels in decibels of different sources of sounds.</string>
          </description>

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les niveaux de volume en
décibels de différentes sources des bruits.</string>
          </description>

nos decibels de fontes diferentes dos sons.</string>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra los niveles de
